dialogueLines.line: Oh my God, why did you jump onto the car all of a sudden? Who are you?
dialogueLines.speaker: mom

dialogueLines.line: No, no! If you're about to get hit, you usually jump to avoid it!
dialogueLines.speaker: lily

dialogueLines.line: I just happened to land on top of your car.
dialogueLines.speaker: lily

dialogueLines.line: Oh really? I'm sorry, my guy was distracted.
dialogueLines.speaker: mom

dialogueLines.line: You're very physical, you're probably not a normal person, are you?
dialogueLines.speaker: mom

dialogueLines.line: Oh, yeah! Woman, I'm looking for someone.
dialogueLines.speaker: lily

dialogueLines.line: Have you seen a couple of children, a man and a woman, anywhere?
dialogueLines.speaker: lily

dialogueLines.line: ...I don't know? I have no idea what they look like with that kind of information.
dialogueLines.speaker: mom

dialogueLines.line: I just met a bearded man who looks a lot like you, and he asked me to eat the couple's boy.
dialogueLines.speaker: lily

dialogueLines.line: Oh, in that case, I know what kind of couple they were.
dialogueLines.speaker: mom

dialogueLines.line: But I'm sorry. I don't know where they are either.
dialogueLines.speaker: mom

dialogueLines.line: Oh, but I know someone who knows the boy, because I just met him. Maybe you can ask him.
dialogueLines.speaker: mom

dialogueLines.line: Then I'll take you to the place where he is now.
dialogueLines.speaker: mom

dialogueLines.line: In the meantime, I'm bored, so I'd like you to come hang out with me for a bit.
dialogueLines.speaker: mom
